description:
Piano With Willie offers lessons to all skill levels of piano players. Willie uses the Foundational / Fundational approach when creating his lessons. Build upon your technique and polish up your skills with our piano lessons. In this lesson learn how to effectively use tritones to add spice to your arrangements. Iâ€™ll also teach you how to create fuller, richer chords with Upper Structure Triads and Quartal voicings.

You will learn what a tritone is and what a substitution is. You will learn which chords use tritone substitutions. You will learn the difference between dominant and tritone resolution. You will learn which tensions work well together. You will apply all of your new knowledge to the song "Abide With Me".
title: Piano With Willie: Tritones & Phat Chords
